participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, with a passion for sports and a love for dolls.
participant_1.background: I won homecoming queen this year. My current goal is to run a k. When I grow up I want to be a physical therapist. I'm currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys playing with dolls and has a fascination with animals.
participant_2.background: I've a pet turtle. I am four. My best friend lives next door. I like to play with my dolls.

content.text: The National Cheerleading Championships.  Oh, yeah, the NCCs.
Because Jenna Maroney is so, so talented.
I don't know her, but belive, that she is talented. What else do you like? I love dolls.
But Mr. Shue's making all the Katys sing a Gaga song, so we bring Penny in to see it and she's gonna get all weak in her Skrillexloving knees and forget all about her douche exboyfriend.
Guy, I'm only for and know nothing about boyfriends!
"But O.M.G., Bree, I love the Asian girl from Glee Club."
"But O.M.G., Bree, I love the Asian girl from Glee Club."
